name: QuickMapTagTeleport
title: Quick Map Tag Teleport
author: kurtzilla
description: Open a dialog by right-clicking on the map view. You may create a tag/icon or teleport to that location. Based on Quick Map Tag https://mods.factorio.com/mod/QuickMapTag by templar4522 and by Tag To Teleport https://mods.factorio.com/mod/TagToTeleport by darkfrei
